title: OpenAI to start testing ChatGPT connectors for Google Drive and Slack
body: OpenAI will soon begin testing a way for business customers to connect apps like Slack and Google Drive to ChatGPT.

title: ChatGPT connecting to your Google Drive and Slack sounds like a remote work game-changer
body: ChatGPT is reportedly working on Google Drive and Slack integration with a new feature that sounds perfect for WFH.
